import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import { MailIcon, PhoneIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const [assignJobDetails, setAssignJobDetails] = useState({fullname:"", email:"", phone:"", message:"" }) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('contact_service', 'template_mizzseu', form.current, 'user_6yw3VTKUnxWHWJFIJuuI9') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setAssignJobDetails({...assignJobDetails, [name]:value }) } return (
